name: Somewhere, in a classic 80 arcade room... (jeanmilost)
name_original: Somewhere, in a classic 80 arcade room... (jeanmilost)
description:
Somewhere, in a classic 80 arcade room, something strange is happening...

This game was created for the Bitsy Classic Game Jam, on November 21, 2020. It respects the imposed constraint of using the first version of the editor to create the game. However, I initially imagined a more complete game, which it was not possible to achieve with this version of the editor. So I created another version of the game, more complete, and available here:

https://jeanmilost.itch.io/somewhere-in-a-80-arcade-room
